item.description:
Join us for a site visit to the home/work place of one of our newest members, Scott Vlaun. Moose Pond Arts + Ecology is located on more than 50 acres about 1 hour north of Portland. We will tour the property, learn how permaculture is playing a role in its ongoing evolution and wrap up with a potluck lunch/open discussion time before returning home.


http://www.mooseponda...


Let's meet at the Marginal Way park-and-ride (across from Bally Total Fitness, NOT across from Wild Oats any longer) at 9:00 - organize ourselves into carpools and depart by 9:15 am.

Other details to be updated as available so check back again soon...

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Field Trip: Moose Pond Arts + Ecology (Otisfield)
